snippet: Mr. Dodd, a former Democratic senator from Connecticut, was given a three-year contract extension as chairman of the Motion Picture Association of America.
abstract: Former Sen Christopher J Dodd of Connecticut will remain chairman and chief executive of Motion Picture Assn of America until 2018.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Dodd, a former Democratic senator from Connecticut, was given a three-year contract extension as chairman of the Motion Picture Association of America.

headline.main: Christopher Dodd Stays On as Top Hollywood Lobbyist
headline.print_headline: Business Briefing; Hollywood Lobbying Group Keeps Dodd as Boss
